item.title: Becoming an R blogger.
item.description: Why start a blog? How to choose a topic Use interesting and easily accessible data examples Keep it simple Creating and hosting your blog Spreading the word Go forth and blog! This year I was given the opportunity to talk at rstudio::conf(2020), which, if youâ€™ve never been, is one of those rare conferences where every person you meet is both extremely friendly and excited about R, and you learn a million fun and useful things that you can actually use.
